doc.title: Gamblers Ruin
doc.plot: Graduating college senior Matt Wilson, inspired by his girlfriend Liz and the idle talent of his weekly poker buddies, na√Ævely decides to open a hip, irreverent underground casino for young, after-hour club-goers. Initially a success, Matt soon discovers how his obsession with the club affects his girlfriend, his closest friends, his rivals, and ultimately, himself. "Gamblers Ruin" is a Comedic Young Human Interest Drama.
